data: combat component extralarge mandatory ship_kha_xl_battleship_01 weapon

The Obliterator Main Battery stands as a towering testament to the overwhelming destructive capabilities that the Kha'ak can bring to bear. This fearsome particle beam gun represents the pinnacle of anti-capital ship armaments, capable of unleashing cataclysmic devastation upon any who dare to challenge Kha'ak supremacy.\n\nWhen unleashed upon capital ships, its searing beam cuts through shields and armour alike with ruthless efficiency, easily rending even the mightiest vessels asunder. Yet it is the weapon's terrifying secondary function that instils dread in the hearts of all who witness its unleashed fury. When pushed to its limits through overcharge, the Obliterator Main Battery transforms into a planet destroyer, a doomsday weapon of unparalleled devastation.
